sentences.sContent: Robert summoned the waiter for the bill.
sentences.sCn: 罗伯特召唤服务员结账。

sentences.sContent: Hugh was summoned to appear before the magistrate.
sentences.sCn: 休被传唤到地方法院出庭。

sentences.sContent: He had to summon the energy to finish the race.
sentences.sCn: 他不得不拼尽全力跑完比赛。

remMethod.val: sum(总)+mon→把人汇总到一起→召唤； 召集

trans.tranCn: 召唤；传讯,传唤；鼓起(勇气),振作(精神)
trans.tranOther: to order someone to come to a place
